job_title: Consultant / Senior Consultant - Financial Services Risk Management
job_responsibilities: ['Join the Consultant / Senior Consultant - Financial Services Risk Management practice and you will provide a well-integrated broad array of risk management services to capital market participants within banking, capital markets, asset management and insurance. FSRM includes individuals who have industry, client and product knowledge as well as quantitative, regulatory, project management and technology professionals. Our teams work together to coordinate the delivery of risk management, regulatory and business performance services.FSRM products and services include Credit Risk/ Capital Adequacy/ Liquidity Risk, Market Risk, Operational Risk, Enterprise Risk, Structured Finance, Anti-Money Laundering, Regulatory Compliance, Prudential Supervision, Bank Holding Company reporting, and Quantitative Advisory Services.With so many offerings, you have the opportunity to develop your career through a broad scope of engagements, and formal learning. That’s how we develop outstanding leaders who team to deliver on our promises to all of our stakeholders, and in so doing, play a critical role in building a better working world for our people, for our clients and for our communities.Responsibilities:Advise financial institutions on a range of prudential and supervisory issues including regulatory and compliance, credit risk, market risk and operational riskConduct risk management advice and framework design and operational effectivenessPerform data preparation (data cleansing, data aggregation etc.)Develop statistical models, such as logistic regression, multivariate regression, clustering, decision tree, random forest etc., across all relevant financial risks following regulatory compliancesDiscover insights from data such as payment behaviors, loss patternsRun model validation, such as A/B testing, on train and test data sets to evaluate model accuracy, reliability, and stabilityPerceive client’s current risk practices and identify gaps to be improvedConduct reports regarding model developments, findings, issues, key decisions etc.Analyze and interpret the results of analytic experiments']
job_qualifications: ['s:Bachelor’s or master’s degree in statistics, computer science, applied mathematics, or engineerNew graduates are welcomeFamiliar with large volume of dataStrong statistical knowledgeStrong analytical, problem solving and managerial skills, and creativityExperience with data analytic application such as SAS, R, Python, and VBAGood communication, interpersonal, and presentation skillsAble to work independently as well as be a good team player under the pressure and within a strict timelinePreferably knowledge in IFRS 9, BASEL, and Financial Modeling ']
job_description: Join the Consultant / Senior Consultant - Financial Services Risk Management practice and you will provide a well-integrated broad array of risk management services to capital market participants within banking, capital markets, asset management and insurance. FSRM includes individuals who have industry, client and product knowledge as well as quantitative, regulatory, project management and technology professionals. Our teams work together to coordinate the delivery of risk management, regulatory and business performance services.FSRM products and services include Credit Risk/ Capital Adequacy/ Liquidity Risk, Market Risk, Operational Risk, Enterprise Risk, Structured Finance, Anti-Money Laundering, Regulatory Compliance, Prudential Supervision, Bank Holding Company reporting, and Quantitative Advisory Services.With so many offerings, you have the opportunity to develop your career through a broad scope of engagements, and formal learning. That’s how we develop outstanding leaders who team to deliver on our promises to all of our stakeholders, and in so doing, play a critical role in building a better working world for our people, for our clients and for our communities.Responsibilities:Advise financial institutions on a range of prudential and supervisory issues including regulatory and compliance, credit risk, market risk and operational riskConduct risk management advice and framework design and operational effectivenessPerform data preparation (data cleansing, data aggregation etc.)Develop statistical models, such as logistic regression, multivariate regression, clustering, decision tree, random forest etc., across all relevant financial risks following regulatory compliancesDiscover insights from data such as payment behaviors, loss patternsRun model validation, such as A/B testing, on train and test data sets to evaluate model accuracy, reliability, and stabilityPerceive client’s current risk practices and identify gaps to be improvedConduct reports regarding model developments, findings, issues, key decisions etc.Analyze and interpret the results of analytic experimentsQualifications:Bachelor’s or master’s degree in statistics, computer science, applied mathematics, or engineerNew graduates are welcomeFamiliar with large volume of dataStrong statistical knowledgeStrong analytical, problem solving and managerial skills, and creativityExperience with data analytic application such as SAS, R, Python, and VBAGood communication, interpersonal, and presentation skillsAble to work independently as well as be a good team player under the pressure and within a strict timelinePreferably knowledge in IFRS 9, BASEL, and Financial Modeling

Legal & Compliance ManagerResponsibilities:• Perform a wide range of company secretarial liaising for regional entities located in Southeast Asia to ensure the statutory requirement are complied.• Establish proper SOP in maintaining the entities’ statutory books and records in compliance with laws and regulatory requirements by the local authority• Implementing internal governance guideline• Support and enhance regional legal management regime and litigation matters by collaborating closely with local legal advisor.• Work closely with internal and external customers concerning service issues• Supervise the execution of corrective action meets customers’specifications.• Ensuring tests and procedures are properly understood, carried out and evaluated.• Formulate and manage the development and implementation of goals, objectives, policies, procedures and systems pertaining to service FIRST• Preparing clear explanatory documents such as customers’ corrective action reports or any other reports as request by the Management.• Facility management for the regional entities, including lease renewal.• Review and advice on contracts and agreements• Handle disputes, litigations or arbitrations collaborating with external law firms• Handle, coordinate and communicate with the Company Secretary on corporate secretarial matters (e.g. the minutes of directors meeting)• Support compliance activities in South East Asia• Be the compliance evangelist for legal trainings forbusiness entities in SEA RequirementsKey Requirements:Bachelor’s or Master's degree in LawThai nationalityMust have at least 5 years’ experience in law firm or corporate companiesExcellent knowledge and understanding of Corporate law, Employment law and proceduresFluent in English (both verbal and written communication) and Thai

job_title: Japanese Interpreter (JLPT N2)/40,000-50,000 THB/month Location: Amatanakorn Industrial Estate

job_title: Senior Product Analytics Manager (Associate Director) - SCBAM
job_description: We are looking for a Product Analytics Manager to join our Product Development Department with main responsibility of accurate data collection, processing, modeling and analysis. The ideal candidate should possess an ability for seeing solutions in extensive data sets and the business mindset to convert insights into strategic opportunities for our product offering direction. The Product Analytics Manager will work closely with other functions across product, marketing and sales to support and implement high-quality, data-driven decisions.ResponsibilitiesLead cross-functional projects using data modeling and analysis techniques to discover insights that will guide strategic decisions and uncover optimization opportunitiesBuild, develop and maintain data models, reporting systems, data automation systems, dashboards and performance metrics to support key business decisionsExamine, interpret and report results of analytical initiatives to management, product, marketing and sales teamRequirementsWorking knowledge of data mining principles: predictive analytics, mapping, collecting data from multiple data systemsUnderstanding of and experience using analytical concepts and statistical techniques: analyzing data, drawing conclusions, and developing actionable recommendations for business units Strong decision-making skills, problem solving, quantitative and analytical abilitiesStrong ability to plan and manage numerous processes, people and projects simultaneouslyExcellent communication and teamwork skills

job_title: เจ้าหน้าที่วิเคราะห์ธุรกิจ
job_description: หน้าที่และความรับผิดชอบ :วิเคราะห์ผลการดำเนินงานรายเดือน และผลการดำเนินงานสะสม(Year to Date) ของบริษัทในกลุ่ม เอ็ม บี เค เปรียบเทียบกับผลการดำเนินงานสำหรับช่วงเดียวกันของปีก่อน (Last Year) และงบประมาณ (Budget) โดยชี้ให้เห็นถึงปัจจัยที่ส่งผลกระทบต่อผลประกอบการในปัจจุบันจัดทำรายงานวิเคราะห์ประจำเดือน เพื่อสรุปผลการดำเนินงานของบริษัทในกลุ่ม เอ็ม บี เค โดยใช้การอธิบายในรูปแบบของบทวิเคราะห์ ตาราง กราฟ แผนภูมิ อัตราส่วน หรือเทคนิคอื่นๆที่เข้าใจง่าย และเหมาะสมกับธุรกิจ จัดทำข้อเสนอแนะเกี่ยวกับการดำเนินธุรกิจ เพื่อปรับปรุงผลประกอบการให้ดีขึ้น จากการวิเคราะห์ถึงแนวโน้มในอนาคต และประเมินความเสี่ยงที่อาจจะเกิดขึ้นกับธุรกิจนั้นๆจัดทำแบบจำลองทางการเงิน(Financial Model) เพื่อศึกษาถึงความเป็นไปได้ในการดำเนินธุรกิจของโครงการต่างๆ (Feasibility Studies) ตามที่ได้รับมอบหมายวิเคราะห์เปรียบเทียบผลประกอบการจริง(Actual results) กับ Feasibility Studies สำหรับการดำเนินงานโครงการใหม่ ระบุถึงปัจจัยสำคัญที่ทำให้ผลประกอบการแตกต่างไปจากที่ศึกษาไว้ และร่วมกับฝ่ายจัดการจัดทำแผนปรับปรุงผลการดำเนินงานของโครงการให้ดีขึ้นสนับสนุนข้อมูลในการดำเนินธุรกิจ และข้อมูลทางการเงินแก่ผู้บริหารระดับสูง เพื่อใช้จัดทำแผนกลยุทธ์ในระยะยาวของกลุ่ม เอ็ม บี เครวบรวมข้อมูล ประเมินผล และจัดทำAction plans สำหรับระบบบริหารคุณภาพขององค์กร ได้แก่ ISO, BSC, KPI, Risk Management และอื่นๆติดต่อประสานงานกับเจ้าหน้าที่ และผู้บริหารของบริษัทในกลุ่ม เอ็ม บี เค เพื่อทำความเข้าใจในการดำเนินธุรกิจ และเสริมสร้างความสัมพันธ์อันดีระหว่างกลุ่มบริษัทงานวิเคราะห์อื่นๆจัดทำรายงานวิเคราะห์ผลการดำเนินงานของบริษัทจดทะเบียนในตลาดหลักทรัพย์ฯ และบริษัทอื่นๆ ที่กลุ่ม เอ็ม บี เค เข้าไปลงทุนวิเคราะห์ผลการดำเนินงานของการลงทุนในบริษัทอื่นๆตามที่ได้รับมอบหมายจัดทำและวิเคราะห์กระแสเงินสดในอนาคต (ระยะเวลา5 ปี) ของกลุ่ม เอ็ม บี เค สนับสนุนข้อมูลในการจัดอันดับเครดิต (Credit Rating) ประจำปีของกลุ่ม เอ็ม บี เคดำเนินงานด้านการบริหารการลงทุนอื่นๆ ตามที่ได้รับมอบหมายจากผู้บริหารคุณสมบัติของตำแหน่งงาน :  กาศึกษาระดับปริญญาตรีด้านบริหารธุรกิจ การเงิน บัญชี เศรษฐศาสตร์และสาขาอื่นๆที่เกี่ยวข้องกับการวิเคราะห์ธุรกิจมีประสบการณ์การทำงานอย่างน้อย 3 ปีขึ้นไปในงานด้านวิเคราะห์ธุรกิจ วิเคราะห์การลงทุน วิเคราะทางการเงิน วิเคราะห์สินเชื่อ วางแผนธุรกิจ พัฒนาธุรกิจ ที่ปรึกษาทางการเงิน หรืองานอื่นๆที่เกี่ยวข้อง เช่น บัญชี เศรษฐศาสตร์ เป็นต้นมีความเชี่ยวชาญในการการวิเคราะห์งบการเงิน (งบดุล งบกำไรขาดทุน งบกระแสเงินสด) และมีความรู้เกี่ยวกับมาตรฐานการบัญชีที่ใช้อยู่ในปัจจุบันมีความเชี่ยวชาญในการวิเคราะห์เชิงธุรกิจ และการเขียนรายงานเชิงวิเคราะห์มีความเชี่ยวชาญในการใช้โปรแกรม Microsoft Excel เป็นอย่างดี หากมีประสบการณ์ในการพัฒนาแบบจำลองทางการเงิน (Financial Model) จะได้รับพิจารณาเป็นกรณีพิเศษ มีความรู้พื้นฐานเกี่ยวกับภาษีอากร และกฎหมายธุรกิจมีทักษะในการติดต่อสื่อสารกับบุคคลทั้งภายในและภายนอกองค์กร (Communication skills)มีทักษะในการนำเสนอ(Presentation skills) มีความรับผิดชอบและซื่อสัตย์ต่อหน้าที่ มีความคิดเป็นระบบ มีมนุษยสัมพันธ์ดี และมีความมุ่งมั่นในภารกิจที่ได้รับมอบหมายมีทัศนคติที่ดีต่อองค์กร และเพื่อนร่วมงาน สามารถเป็นตัวอย่างที่ดีให้กับทีมงานได้Attractive remuneration package and welfare including career advancement opportunity will be provided to the right candidate commensurately to working experiences and qualifications such as :BonusMedical Fee (OPD, IPD)Life /Accident InsuranceAnnual Check-upProvident FundSaving CoorperativeSocial SecurityFuneral ceremony allowanceUniformInterested candidates please send application letter with your resume stating full qualifications, experience, current as well as expected remuneration and a recent photograph to an e-mail address below. MBK Public Company Limited444 8flr., Phayathai Road, Wangmai, Patumwan,Bangkok 10330 Thailand.Tel: 02-853-7223,02-853-7217 Fax.02-8537000Website:www.mbkgroup.co.thThe candidates invite to apply in person on Monday- Friday in morning at 10.00 - 11.00 AM. and in afternoon at 13.00 - 16.00 PM. (ยกเว้นวันหยุดนักขัตฤกษ์)

job_title: Social Auditor - HR / Compensation & Benefit / Safety/ผู้ตรวจด้านงานค่าแรงค่าจ้าง และ ความปลอดภัย
job_description: JOB DUTIES:The following job duties are general requirements and are not to be considered all-inclusive.Complying with the applicable audit requirementsSEDEX-Smeta, SA8000, WRAP, C-TPAT, URSA, SGP, TLS8001, BSCI and COC (Code of Conduct)Communicating and clarifying audit requirementsPlanning and carrying out assigned responsibilitiesDocumenting the audit findings / observationsReporting the audit resultsCommunicating audit results to facility management in a professional, objective, and clearVerifying the effectiveness of corrective actions taken as a result of auditRetaining and safeguarding documents pertaining to the auditCooperating with and supporting other auditor;Act in an ethical manner at all times.EXPERIENCE/EDUCATION REQUIRED:University Degree of Human Resources / Political Science / Legal or Related FieldMinimum of 5 years experience of HR, Compensations & Benefit, Labour Law in manufacturing, quality assurance or related technical activity.Strong communication skills, verbal and written.Ideal candidate should have excellent verbal and written comprehension.Ideal candidate should be analytical and comfortable with mathematics and calculations.This job requires physical activity, walking throughout manufacturing factory environment.Travel will be required.Strong skills in public speaking and presentation are definitely the advantages to be considered.

job_description: Legal CounselEssential Duties & ResponsibilitiesProvide legal advice and manage local resources of legal counsels and lawyers.Providing support on a wide range of legal activities.Provide legal support in various projects, including but not limited to major projects in terms of contract.Advising on general business law issues and managing the legal issues of all areas of the company, including but not limited to corporate matters, procurement, safety, security, insurance and sustainability issues. negotiation, drafting, due diligence etc.Represent the department as required in liaison with the Country Manager / Business Units ManagerEthics and Compliance and governance services.Cooperation with the other members of the legal department abroad.Evaluate local legal system and potential legal risks, and provide counter measures.To secure compliance of business operations with relevant laws and regulations.To pro-actively create and maintain awareness of business employees for (compliance with) relevant laws and regulations.Ability to deliver high-quality work under deadlines.Basic QualificationsBachelor's Degree in Law with strong academic credentials.8 years of legal experience in a top tier national or international law firm.Strong legal experience in corporate and commercial matters.Experience on managing external legal counsels.Relevant experience in at least one of the following areas.Solid knowledge of general business law issues of an independent power producer, including regulatory framework.Strong written and oral communication skills in English.

job_responsibilities: ['Job Description:1. ศึกษา วิเคราะห์ วางแผน ริเริ่ม และกำกับดูแลโครงการด้าน- วิเคราะห์ข้อมูลการตลาด และธุรกรรมประกันชีวิต (Marketing and Life Operations Data Analysis)- พัฒนาประสบการณ์ลูกค้า และเส้นทางการเดินของลูกค้า (Customer Experience and Journey Enhancement) เพื่อสร้างประสบการณ์ที่ดีกับผู้เอาประกัน ผู้มุ่งหวัง และตัวแทนฝ่ายขาย เพื่อต่อยอดการขาย (Repeat Purchase / Up Selling / Cross Selling) ส่งเสริมไม่ให้กรมธรรม์ขาดสถานะ (Policy Retention) และรักษาความผูกพันของลูกค้า (Customer Loyalty)- โครงการริเริ่มอื่นๆ (Initiatives) ตามนโยบายบริษัทที่ได้รับมอบหมาย2. สนับสนุนในการบริหารจัดการ (Project Management) และประสานงานกับหน่วยงานที่เกี่ยวข้องทั้งภายในและภายนอก เพื่อให้การดำเนินการของโครงการเป็นไปตามแผนงานและบรรลุวัตถุประสงค์ กรอบระยะเวลาการทำงาน และงบประมาณที่กำหนด3. สนับสนุน ให้คำแนะนำ และช่วยเหลือในการดำเนินกิจกรรม พร้อมแก้ไขปัญหาเฉพาะหน้า เพื่อให้บรรลุวัตถุประสงค์ของโครงการ']
job_qualifications: [':- ปริญญาตรี หรือปริญญาโท สาขาบริหารธุรกิจ เศรษฐศาสตร์ หรือสาขาอื่นๆ ที่เกี่ยวข้อง- ประสบการณ์อย่างน้อย 5 ปี ด้านการบริหารจัดการโครงการ การวิเคราะห์ข้อมูล การออกแบบกระบวนการทำงาน หรือในธุรกิจประชีวิตจะได้รับการพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ- มีความเชี่ยวชาญในการใช้ภาษาอังกฤษ และมีทักษะในการนำเสนอ ']

Your future teamTo handle Line of Business portfolio through legal liability assessment (where relevant) and quantum analysis, to timely and accurate resolution; ensuring mitigation of indemnity and expense exposure while communicating developments and outcomes as necessary to all key internal and external stakeholders. Provide a high standard of customer service and adherence to legal and regulatory requirements.Your contribution at AIGAs an influencer at AIG, people come to you as a “go-to” source for help and support because of your deep knowledge and expertise. As a more experienced team member, you are capable of driving continual improvement and impacting the way that things get done. Support on reviewing the English translation and/ or doing the English translation on the simple message.Provide the Administrative works for Compliance Department .Support Compliance on any ad hoc operations as assigned by Compliance Department.What we are looking forBachelor or Master Degree in Law or relatedAt least 3-5 years working experience in Legal or Compliance and/ or audit field.Working in an insurance industry is preferable.Skill in computer program – Excel, Word, Power Points, Outlook, etc.Good command of EnglishGood interpersonal skills, team player, positive attitude, self-learning, enthusiastic to work.

job_responsibilities: [' คุณสมบัติเบื้องต้นมีความรู้และประสบการณ์ด้านงานกฎหมายวุฒิขั้นต่ำปริญญาตรี ทางนิติศาสตร์ หรือคุณวุฒิอย่างอื่นที่เทียบเคียงได้ในระดับเดียวกัน จากสถาบันการศึกษาทั้งในและต่างประเทศ ที่ ก.พ. รับรองความคิดวิเคราะห์อย่างเป็นระบบ และสามารถทำงานภายใต้ความกดดันได้ มีทักษะการติดต่อสื่อสารระหว่างผู้ร่วมงานได้อย่างมีประสิทธิภาพมนุษย์สัมพันธ์ดี สามารถทำงานเป็นทีมได้หากได้รับประกาศนียบัตรคุณวุฒิวิชาชีพ หนังสือรับรองมาตรฐานอาชีพ หรือ หนังสือรับรองสมรรถนะ จากสถาบันคุณวุฒิวิชาชีพ จะได้รับพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษหน้าที่งานที่ปฏิบัติโดยสังเขปปฏิบัติงานในฐานะผู้ปฏิบัติงานระดับต้น รับผิดชอบปฏิบัติงานด้านกฎหมาย ข้อบังคับ ระเบียบ ประกาศ คำสั่ง งานคดี สอบสวน วินัย อุทธรณ์ ร้องทุกข์ งานนิติกรรมสัญญา โดยมีรายละเอียด ดังนี้ ศึกษาวิเคราะห์ จัดทำร่างกฎหมาย ข้อบังคับ ระเบียบ ประกาศ คำสั่งต่าง ๆ เพื่อใช้ประกอบการดำเนินงานและ การบริหารจัดการสถาบันศึกษา วิเคราะห์ รวบรวมข้อมูล ข้อเท็จจริง ให้ความเห็นในงานนิติกรรมสัญญา งานคดี สอบสวน วินัย อุทธรณ์ ร้องทุกข์ให้ความเห็น ชี้แจงรายละเอียดข้อกฎหมาย ข้อเท็จจริง และประสานงานกับหน่วยงาน หรือบุคคลอื่นเกี่ยวกับงานด้านกฎหมายปฏิบัติงานอื่น ๆ ตามที่ได้รับมอบหมายร่วมดำเนินการวางแผนการทำงานตามแผนงานหรือโครงการของหน่วยงานระดับสำนัก และช่วยแก้ปัญหาในการปฏิบัติงานให้คำปรึกษาแนะนำและบริการข้อมูล ตอบแก้ไขปัญหา หรือชี้แจงเรื่องต่างๆ ของงานในความรับผิดชอบแก่ผู้บังคับบัญชาหน่วยงาน บุคคลทั้งภายในและภายนอกอย่างมีประสิทธิภาพปฏิบัติงานอื่นๆ ตามที่ได้รับมอบหมายจากผู้บังคับบัญชาสถานที่ทำงาน สถาบันคุณวุฒิวิชาชีพ (องค์การมหาชน)1177 อาคารเพิร์ล แบงก์ค็อก ชั้น 14 ถนนพหลโยธิน แขวงพญาไท เขตพญาไท กทม (BTS สถานีอารีย์ ทางออกที่ 1)เวลาทำงานวันจันทร์ – ศุกร์ เวลา8.30 – 16.30 น. เงินเดือนตามโครงสร้างสถาบัน สวัสดิการประกันชีวิต-อุบัติเหตุ ประกันสุขภาพกลุ่ม ค่ารักษาพยาบาลเพิ่มเติมจากสถาบัน ลาพักร้อน15 วันต่อปี กองทุนสำรองเลี้ยงชีพ เงินช่วยเหลือค่าเล่าเรียนบุตร หน้าที่และความรับผิดชอบร่วมร่างและแก้ไขกฎหมายกับภาครัฐ ในระดับของ พ.ร.บ. พ.ร.ก. หรือประกาศ ของกระทรวงสำรวจ รวมทั้งประเมิน ผลกระทบของกฎหมาย ต่อการดำเนินธุรกิจของภาคเอกชน เพื่อร่วมร่างและแก้ไขกฎหมายกับภาครัฐ ตาม ข้อ 1.วิจัยตัวอย่างของการออกกฎหมายในต่างประเทศ เพื่อร่วมร่างและแก้ไขกฎหมายกับภาครัฐ ตาม ข้อ 1.ติดตาม การออกกฎหมายใหม่ ในระดับของ พ.ร.บ. พ.ร.ก. หรือประกาศ ของกระทรวง และเขียนบทวิเคราะห์ ผลกระทบ ต่อการดำเนินธุรกิจของภาคเอกชนเป็นประธาน/เลขา/Moderator ในที่ประชุมที่มีผู้บริหารภาครัฐ ภาคเอกชน และภาคส่วนอื่นๆคุณสมบัติปริญญาโทสาขากฎหมาย ที่ต้องทำวิทยานิพนธ์มีประสบการณ์ด้านกฎหมาย 7 ปีสามารถสื่อสารภาษาอังกฤษ ทั้งภาษาพูด และภาษาเขียน กับนักกฎหมายต่างชาติได้มีบุคคลิกที่น่าเชื่อถือและเป็นผู้นำที่ผู้คนคล้อยตาม

job_responsibilities: ['Role Purpose:To provide product compliance consultation and service, by reviewing sale materials in accordance with relevant laws and regulations and PCA policies and standards. Organization Context: This position is responsible for reviewing product materials to ensure PLT product materials comply with relevant laws and regulations, PCA policies & standards, and in considering of customer fairness. Key Accountabilities and Performance Measures Impacted:List up to eight accountabilities of the role and the performance measures affected by each accountability. Key accountabilities are the areas in which the position is expected to produce result s on a continuing basis and should include the action that is taken and the area the action impacts on.Key Accountabilities:Attend product implementation committee meeting or working group meeting in relation to TTB product implementation.Understand product features, benefits, condition and target customer and PLT launch plan, to incorporate in product materials review.Work with Product marketing, distribution channel or relevant functions to solve issues related to product materials, and to align with PLT, PCA /regulation requirements.Provide compliance consultation for product related matters, regarding relevant laws and regulations, including PCA policies and standards.Review and provide comment on the marketing materials which include but not limited to brochure, sales illustration, product training materials, sales script, welcome call script etc. to be complied with applicable regulations and Regional Compliance Standards.Coordinate with PCA Compliance for product materials review and approval.Any other jobs, ad-hoc projects or assignment by Head of Compliance or Senior Manager.Performance measures:Complete review of the marketing materials of insurance products following to Regional Compliance Standard and guidelines within the agreed TAT.Less incident arose from those reviewed / approved materials, without sound reasonable justification.Feedback from key stakeholders.Complete ad-hoc project effectively within acceptable target.Minimum requirements: (']
job_qualifications: ['s and Experience)Bachelor’s degree or higher in Law, Accounting, Finance, Economics or related fields.3-5 years of working experience in Compliance or related fields.Working experience in insurance industry, banking and consulting firm will be advantage.Key Attributes:An ability to establish and develop constructive relationships based on trust, respect and reliability with relevant parties and teamGood analytical skills, strong communication, presentation skills will be advantage.Positive thinking, self-motivated, good attitude and team working style.Excellent communication skills in Thai and English, both written and spoken.Computer literacy in MS.Word, Excel, Power PointInterested applicants are invited to submit the resume via "Apply Now" or to the address below :Prudential Life Assurance(Thailand) Public company Limited9/9 @ Sathorn Tower, 20th-27th floor,South Sathorn Road, Yannawa, Sathorn, Bangkok 10120Tel. 02-352-8000 ']
job_description: Role Purpose:To provide product compliance consultation and service, by reviewing sale materials in accordance with relevant laws and regulations and PCA policies and standards. Organization Context: This position is responsible for reviewing product materials to ensure PLT product materials comply with relevant laws and regulations, PCA policies & standards, and in considering of customer fairness. Key Accountabilities and Performance Measures Impacted:List up to eight accountabilities of the role and the performance measures affected by each accountability. Key accountabilities are the areas in which the position is expected to produce result s on a continuing basis and should include the action that is taken and the area the action impacts on.Key Accountabilities:Attend product implementation committee meeting or working group meeting in relation to TTB product implementation.Understand product features, benefits, condition and target customer and PLT launch plan, to incorporate in product materials review.Work with Product marketing, distribution channel or relevant functions to solve issues related to product materials, and to align with PLT, PCA /regulation requirements.Provide compliance consultation for product related matters, regarding relevant laws and regulations, including PCA policies and standards.Review and provide comment on the marketing materials which include but not limited to brochure, sales illustration, product training materials, sales script, welcome call script etc. to be complied with applicable regulations and Regional Compliance Standards.Coordinate with PCA Compliance for product materials review and approval.Any other jobs, ad-hoc projects or assignment by Head of Compliance or Senior Manager.Performance measures:Complete review of the marketing materials of insurance products following to Regional Compliance Standard and guidelines within the agreed TAT.Less incident arose from those reviewed / approved materials, without sound reasonable justification.Feedback from key stakeholders.Complete ad-hoc project effectively within acceptable target.Minimum requirements: (Qualifications and Experience)Bachelor’s degree or higher in Law, Accounting, Finance, Economics or related fields.3-5 years of working experience in Compliance or related fields.Working experience in insurance industry, banking and consulting firm will be advantage.Key Attributes:An ability to establish and develop constructive relationships based on trust, respect and reliability with relevant parties and teamGood analytical skills, strong communication, presentation skills will be advantage.Positive thinking, self-motivated, good attitude and team working style.Excellent communication skills in Thai and English, both written and spoken.Computer literacy in MS.Word, Excel, Power PointInterested applicants are invited to submit the resume via "Apply Now" or to the address below :Prudential Life Assurance(Thailand) Public company Limited9/9 @ Sathorn Tower, 20th-27th floor,South Sathorn Road, Yannawa, Sathorn, Bangkok 10120Tel. 02-352-8000

job_title: Assistant Manager - Purchasing Data Analyst /ผู้ช่วยผู้จัดการวิเคราะห์ข้อมูลจัดซื้อ
job_description: Assistant Manager - Purchasing Data Analyst /ผู้ช่วยผู้จัดการวิเคราะห์ข้อมูลจัดซื้อLocation: ตึกเล้าเป้งง้วน ถ.วิภาวดีหน้าที่และความรับผิดชอบกำกับดูแลการวิเคราะห์ข้อมูลการจัดซื้อให้มีความถูกต้อง และทันต่อความต้องการของธุรกิจ เพื่อนำเสนอข้อมูลในการกำหนดนโยบายและการวางแผนกลยุทธ์การจัดซื้อจัดจ้างให้คำแนะนำ และระบุสิ่งที่ควรปรับปรุงจากข้อมูลที่วิเคราะห์ได้ เพื่อเพิ่มประสิทธิภาพให้การจัดซื้อจัดจ้างกำกับดูและและพัฒนารูปแบบการจัดทำรายงานProcurement Executive Information System เพื่อนำเสนอข้อมูลที่ถูกต้อง และตรงตามวัตถุประสงค์การใช้งานของผู้บริหารกำกับดูแลการกำหนดโครงสร้างมาตรฐานสินค้าและบริการแต่ละประเภท รวมถึงการบำรุงรักษาฐานข้อมูลสินค้าและฐานข้อมูลผู้ขายให้เป็นไปตามที่กำหนดกำกับดูแลการจัดกลุ่มข้อมูลMaterial และ Vendor Master ให้มีความถูกต้องเพื่อใช้ในการวิเคราะห์ข้อมูลและการจัดทำรายงานอย่างมีประสิทธิภาพ วางแผนเพื่อพัฒนาผู้ใต้บังคับบัญชาเพื่อเพิ่มประสิทธิภาพและองค์ความรู้ของทีมงานให้สอดคล้องกับเป้าประสงค์ของธุรกิจปฏิบัติงานอื่นๆ ตามได้ที่รับมอบหมายคุณสมบัติปริญญาตรี/โท สาขา วิทยาการคอมพิวเตอร์,สถิติ, การบริหารจัดการข้อมูลสารสนเทศ หรือสาขาอื่นๆ ที่เกี่ยวข้องมีประสบการณ์ในด้านงานวิเคราะห์ข้อมูลจัดซื้อและระบบสารสนเทศในงานจัดซื้ออย่างน้อย5-7 ปี และมีความรู้ในธุรกิจจัดซื้อเป็นอย่างดีมีความรู้ด้านการจัดการระบบฐานข้อมูลขั้นตอนและระบบงานเป็นผู้นำมีทักษะทางความคิดเชิงวิเคราะห์และมีความรู้ด้านธุรกิจขององค์กรและธุรกิจอื่นๆ ที่เกี่ยวข้องมีทักษะการใช้Excel PTT SQL Command SSIS Cube มีความละเอียดรอบคอบ มีการเรียนรู้และพัฒนาตัวเองอยู่เสมอติดต่อสอบถามสำนักทรัพยากรบุคคลบริษัท ไทยเบฟเวอเรจ จำกัด (มหาชน)อาคารไทยเบฟควอเตอร์ เลขที่62ถนนรัชดาภิเษก แขวงคลองเตย เขตคลองเตย กรุงเทพฯ10110

job_title: Social Auditor - HR / Compensation & Benefit / Safety/ผู้ตรวจด้านงานค่าแรงค่าจ้าง และ ความปลอดภัย
job_description: JOB DUTIES:The following job duties are general requirements and are not to be considered all-inclusive.Complying with the applicable audit requirementsSEDEX-Smeta, SA8000, WRAP, C-TPAT, URSA, SGP, TLS8001, BSCI and COC (Code of Conduct)Communicating and clarifying audit requirementsPlanning and carrying out assigned responsibilitiesDocumenting the audit findings / observationsReporting the audit resultsCommunicating audit results to facility management in a professional, objective, and clearVerifying the effectiveness of corrective actions taken as a result of auditRetaining and safeguarding documents pertaining to the auditCooperating with and supporting other auditor;Act in an ethical manner at all times.EXPERIENCE/EDUCATION REQUIRED:University Degree of Human Resources / Political Science / Legal or Related FieldMinimum of 5 years experience of HR, Compensations & Benefit, Labour Law in manufacturing, quality assurance or related technical activity.Strong communication skills, verbal and written.Ideal candidate should have excellent verbal and written comprehension.Ideal candidate should be analytical and comfortable with mathematics and calculations.This job requires physical activity, walking throughout manufacturing factory environment.Travel will be required.Strong skills in public speaking and presentation are definitely the advantages to be considered.

job_responsibilities: ['Individuals within the IT Compliance role are responsible for ensuring that the organization in accomplishing its objectives by bringing a systematic, disciplined approach to evaluating and improving the effectiveness of IT risk management as well as regulatory compliance.Persons in this role will be a primary resource for driving adherence to compliance and regulatory IT controls. They will lead projects to implementing the Corporate IT Compliance Program and identifying gaps to management. Will assist development of continuous monitoring controls to assess the IT control environment and its effectiveness against the IT Corporate Compliance Standards. Partner with the Regulatory Compliance team to provide guidance and enhancements of control adjustments based on regulatory, industry or corporate standards. Members of this role need to understand IT related operational business processes, software development life cycles, Controls, security principals, process design, and knowledge of compliance management. ResponsibilitiesEnsure of information & IT related regulations & Policies Compliance (Gap and Implement)Provide technical and quality oversight regarding IT related regulations & Policies Compliant, including controls and technologies, control implementation, evaluation of segregation of duties, and process improvement opportunitiesCollaborate with Risk management on IT Risk Management, IT Vendor Risk management, and the ongoing evaluation and updating of IT compliance Policies and procedures. Coordinate and manage the execution of internal audits and the needs of internal and external auditorsEvaluate and ensure remediation of identified control deficiencies in a timely mannerReview system implementations to assess risks and potential impact to the key controlsAssist in the preparation of executive presentations and participate in recurring compliance committee & Data management Committee meetings ']
job_qualifications: ['sBachelor’s degree is required in a related field; information systems, computer science,business, preferredMinimum experience of five years in internal or external auditing, with emphasis on IT auditing, preferably with larger companies having complex IT environments or Big 4 accounting firm A detailed understanding of the general computer control areas and the IT governance frameworkProven experience with evaluating security and controlsStrong ability to understand, assess and prioritize risks across the components of the IT environment (application, operating system, and database)Solid communication skills, including a proven ability to articulate to others outside of Compliance complex IT risks, their impact, and the required action plans to address those risksOne or more of the following professional certifications is a plus: Certified Information SystemsAuditor (CISA), Certified Information Systems Security Professionals (CISSP); Certified Information Security Manager (CISM) or Certified Information Privacy Professional (CIPP) ']
job_description: Individuals within the IT Compliance role are responsible for ensuring that the organization in accomplishing its objectives by bringing a systematic, disciplined approach to evaluating and improving the effectiveness of IT risk management as well as regulatory compliance.Persons in this role will be a primary resource for driving adherence to compliance and regulatory IT controls. They will lead projects to implementing the Corporate IT Compliance Program and identifying gaps to management. Will assist development of continuous monitoring controls to assess the IT control environment and its effectiveness against the IT Corporate Compliance Standards. Partner with the Regulatory Compliance team to provide guidance and enhancements of control adjustments based on regulatory, industry or corporate standards. Members of this role need to understand IT related operational business processes, software development life cycles, Controls, security principals, process design, and knowledge of compliance management. ResponsibilitiesEnsure of information & IT related regulations & Policies Compliance (Gap and Implement)Provide technical and quality oversight regarding IT related regulations & Policies Compliant, including controls and technologies, control implementation, evaluation of segregation of duties, and process improvement opportunitiesCollaborate with Risk management on IT Risk Management, IT Vendor Risk management, and the ongoing evaluation and updating of IT compliance Policies and procedures. Coordinate and manage the execution of internal audits and the needs of internal and external auditorsEvaluate and ensure remediation of identified control deficiencies in a timely mannerReview system implementations to assess risks and potential impact to the key controlsAssist in the preparation of executive presentations and participate in recurring compliance committee & Data management Committee meetings QualificationsBachelor’s degree is required in a related field; information systems, computer science,business, preferredMinimum experience of five years in internal or external auditing, with emphasis on IT auditing, preferably with larger companies having complex IT environments or Big 4 accounting firm A detailed understanding of the general computer control areas and the IT governance frameworkProven experience with evaluating security and controlsStrong ability to understand, assess and prioritize risks across the components of the IT environment (application, operating system, and database)Solid communication skills, including a proven ability to articulate to others outside of Compliance complex IT risks, their impact, and the required action plans to address those risksOne or more of the following professional certifications is a plus: Certified Information SystemsAuditor (CISA), Certified Information Systems Security Professionals (CISSP); Certified Information Security Manager (CISM) or Certified Information Privacy Professional (CIPP)

job_title: Manager – Data Consulting – Strategy and Governance
job_responsibilities: ["Job DescriptionThe Data Consulting team helps our clients maximize business value of data by improving how it is governed, managed, protected and used to optimize customer experience, growth, and cost. The successful candidate will provide strategic and technical advisory work to our clients that allows them to exploit their information and data needs. They will be working amongst high performing individuals, delivering industry leading analytics, reporting and data management capabilities.This role is focused on Data Strategy and Governance, providing strategic and technical advisory work to our clients.Responsibilities:The Data Consultant – Manager role involves:Client delivery:— Working directly with our clients, conducting interviews, running workshops and leading teams to advise clients on their journey towards better use of data in their business.— Leveraging techniques and tools to: develop data analytics solutions; identify patterns, extract outliers, and perform analyses to address client problems; develop data visualisations to display analyses to end users— Taking charge of project delivery: from initial client consultation to presentation of results, being responsible for the delivery of client facing projects; overseeing the solution design and architecture; managing a KPMG team of various sizes and abilities; being the main day to day point of contact for senior client contacts; and taking ownership and responsibility for seeing the project through to its completion— Leading multiple large, complex work streams in rapidly changing environments, which includes identifying and managing risks, managing project budgets, resource allocation, WIP management and billing and delivering to the requirementsEnhancing team capabilities:— Developing propositions, focusing on specific themes and/or clients— Leading delivery teams, giving clear directions, as well as positive and constructive feedback. Coaching less experienced staff and assisting in the development of others— Taking a proactive lead for knowledge management and sharing within a specialist team— Keeping abreast of developments across the data and analytics landscape, with the desire to translate cutting-edge techniques and technologies into our project outputsManaging the team:— Helping the leadership to manage resource allocation, training, performance management and financial performance of the team— Building and sustaining relationships with clients and internally within KPMG and use these relationships to identify work— Identifying and managing risks, ensuring the Firm's risk management frameworks are implemented appropriately and effectively"]
job_qualifications: ['s:This exciting role will fully utilise the candidate’s consulting, data analysis and data management skills. Candidates should have 5 - 8 years of experience working in at least one of the core areas with experience in one of the supplementary areas being desirable. Field specific, external accreditation with an appropriate body is desirable.Core Areas:— Defined and/or implemented data governance strategy and processes including the definition of data standards— Defined and/or implemented data management approaches. Including but not limited to the selection of appropriate technology solutions, definition and running of data management processes and definition and maintenance of data quality standards— Defined and/or implemented a data or information strategy for an organisationSupplementary areas:— Built or assessed organisations against data maturity models or frameworks— Led projects which focused on data quality or data migration activities— Defined and implemented Business Intelligence or reporting strategies— Appreciation of reporting, modelling and other data technologies— Designing and querying relational databases, including ETL and SQL development— Data visualisation tools and techniquesIn addition candidates must be able to demonstrate a number, if not all, of the following:— Proven experience of working in an analytics business partnering environment, preferably in a professional services / consulting environment— Experience of leading and delivering data projects for clients, including the experience of leading and managing teams— Excellent written and verbal communication skills, including technical writing skills and the ability to explain complex technical analysis to a non-technical audience— The ability to manage time and work independently with multiple stakeholders— A desire to understand business problems and to evaluate the results of your work in a business context— Proven experience of helping clients with complex issues and dealing with the uncertainty that can arise in project situations, including having a tenacious problem solving and can-do attitude;— Entrepreneurial and a commercial mind-set;— High degree of personal motivation, ability to self-manage whilst being professional and personable— Proficient in Thai and English languageKPMG Phoomchai Audit Ltd.Human Resources Department Empire Tower50th Floor1South Sathorn Rd.,Yannawa, Sathorn Bangkok10120Contact person:Kulthida Y.Tel:02 677 2000 ']

CompliancePrepare, review and negotiate various contracts involving customer agreements, service purchases, vendor relationships, labor matters, licenses, leases, among others.Ensure company follows related laws and regulations, provide preliminary advice and recommendations pertaining to legal, regulatory, and governance issues and practices.Advise on business transactions, claim liability, opportunity to prosecute or defend lawsuitsProvide consultation and legal advice to the company on its legal rights and obligationsAdvise the company during the negotiations in order to clarify the major risks involved and the ways to avoid or mitigate such risksFollow through on steps of the commercial process to ensure full legal compliance and best risks mitigation at all steps as per assignment by the company.Ensuring that corporate information disclosure and related regulatory filings are in accordance with laws and regulations.Draft and guaranty compliance for:All purchase agreement including goods and services and/or if any of Logistics agreements (storage, transportation, road, rail, etc.). Shipping and chartering contracts.Insurance contracts.2. BOI, Company RegistrationPrepare and follow up with BOI application for new project. Maintain or renew present projects.Prepare and collect all related documents which are legal and personal documents and submit them to theDBD, BOI. Receive the BOI approval and proceed last process at the DBD fulfill the requirement (FBC, etc.)Perform refund BOI machine and raw material Keep update BOI’s Formula to active Review the logistics component of field office budget proposals for consideration Manage the inspection Maintain and follow up record for all BOI overview and leading necessary action to compliance with regulation and ensure to maximize BOI privilege.3. Provide constructive support for affiliate in Thailand for legal matter if any may assigned by company.Qualifications:Bachelor's Degree or higher in Corporate Law, Logistics, Supply Chain Management, Business Administration or related fields5+ years of experience as an attorney with a corporation dealing with commercial/business contracts, and other business transactions, and labor lawsExperience with business, contract, Uniform Commercial Code and corporate law, Department of Transportation compliance, and knowledge of logistics and energy related industries. Excellent in both of Thai and English communication skills in written, verbal and presentationCan do attitude with high responsibility, result oriented, able to balance out flexibility and disciplinary when necessaryIf you are interested, please submit your profile to Jobsdb website. Benya Tel.: 085 056 3465

job_responsibilities: ["UNLOCK YOUR POTENTIAL FOR GROWTH WITH GRANT THORNTONGrant Thornton is one of the world's leading business advisory organisations with some 700 offices in over 130 countries. Meeting and negotiation with government departments re tax and legal issues (e.g. BOI, Foreign Business License, Customs)"]

job_title: CRM Data and Business Solution Specialist
job_responsibilities: ['UNIQLO (Thailand) is nowlooking for the person who is interested to join us asCRM Data and Business Solution Specialistto be part ofe-Commerce and Marketing Team.For more information, please find below details.Role:This position plays a crucial role in not only UNIQLO’s e-commerce business, but also our Thailand’s business. By utilizing data and insights, this person will initiate and be assigned projects to improve various parts of our business as well as e-commerce business. The scope of improvement includes customer touch points, inventory, sales and marketing. This is a new role, successful candidate should be prepared to get his/her hands dirty and will be required to be energetic, proactive and be a self-starter.Job Responsibilities:Identify key gaps and opportunities, set priorities, and develop and execute on the vision, strategy and roadmap,all in close collaboration with various internal teams, management and vendors.Internalize and deeply understand UNIQLO and commerce’s vision, products and strategies.Juggling between projects and tasks, collaborate with internal/external parties and drive business according to goals, data and insights.Define metrics and, on a weekly’s basis, evaluate results and take required actions to move the business forward.Be focused on creating business impact. Always be ready to navigate through ambiguity and complexity to achieve goals.Be customer oriented and always listen and think from customer’s perspective.Be deeply truth-seeking. Dig dive into the data to gain better understanding of customers, catch product trends, find opportunities and to help others make an informed decision.Job ']
job_qualifications: ['s:Bachelor’s or higher degree in Business Management, Information Technology, Engineering or any related field Age between 28 – 35 yearsOver 4 working experience years with the proven achievement record in data analysis, business solution or similar roleSolid background in customer acquisition strategiesKnowledge of CRM, online marketing methods and best practices will be a plusExperience using SQL Server, and Python Programming LanguageStrong quantitative/ analytical skillsBe customer centric, open-minded, adaptable to changes and a good self-starter.Possessing a desire to work for fast moving, proactive and result-oriented companyVery good communication skill to manage cross-functional project effectivelyExcellent command both Thai and EnglishWorking Place:Uniqlo (Thailand) Co., Ltd. (Head Office)Mitrtown Office Tower, No. 944, 18th floor,Rama 4 Road, Wangmai, Pathumwan, Bangkok 10330For more information, please feel free to contact02-078-5500every Mon - Fri during 8.00 - 17.00 hrs.Those candidates who are interest in this position,please send resume (Word or PDF), current and expected salary, contact phone number and recent photo via"Apply Now"as below.Please note that, only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for further steps. ']

By utilizing data and insights, this person will initiate and be assigned projects to improve various parts of our business as well as e-commerce business. This is a new role, successful candidate should be prepared to get his/her hands dirty and will be required to be energetic, proactive and be a self-starter.Job Responsibilities:Identify key gaps and opportunities, set priorities, and develop and execute on the vision, strategy and roadmap,all in close collaboration with various internal teams, management and vendors.Internalize and deeply understand UNIQLO and commerce’s vision, products and strategies.Juggling between projects and tasks, collaborate with internal/external parties and drive business according to goals, data and insights.Define metrics and, on a weekly’s basis, evaluate results and take required actions to move the business forward.Be focused on creating business impact. Always be ready to navigate through ambiguity and complexity to achieve goals.Be customer oriented and always listen and think from customer’s perspective.Be deeply truth-seeking. Dig dive into the data to gain better understanding of customers, catch product trends, find opportunities and to help others make an informed decision.Job Qualifications:Bachelor’s or higher degree in Business Management, Information Technology, Engineering or any related field Age between 28 – 35 yearsOver 4 working experience years with the proven achievement record in data analysis, business solution or similar roleSolid background in customer acquisition strategiesKnowledge of CRM, online marketing methods and best practices will be a plusExperience using SQL Server, and Python Programming LanguageStrong quantitative/ analytical skillsBe customer centric, open-minded, adaptable to changes and a good self-starter.Possessing a desire to work for fast moving, proactive and result-oriented companyVery good communication skill to manage cross-functional project effectivelyExcellent command both Thai and EnglishWorking Place:Uniqlo (Thailand) Co., Ltd. job_title: เจ้าหน้าที่ระบบ ERP (ประจำสำนักงานบางรัก)
job_description: รายละเอียดงานบริหารจัดการระบบ ERP ในส่วนของงานโปรแกรม Oracleวิเคราะห์ปัญหาและออกแบบระบบให้สอดคล้องกับกระบวนการทำงาน ของบริษัทรวมถึงดำเนินการวิเคราะห์ความต้องการของผู้ใช้งาน รวมทั้งผลกระทบในภาพรวม ของการขอแก้ไข ปรับแต่งรายงานต่างๆให้ตรงตามความต้องการของ userให้คำแนะนำและแก้ไขปัญหาที่เกิดขึ้น ให้กับ user ในการใช้งานระบบพัฒนาหรือเขียนโปรแกรม ในส่วนที่ต้องมีการปรับแต่ง (Customize)เพิ่มเติม เพื่อให้ ERP ตอบสนองต่อธุรกิจของบริษัทให้ได้มากที่สุดคุณสมบัติเพศชาย/หญิง วุฒิปริญญาตรี สาขาเทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศ หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้องประสบการณ์ทำงาน อย่างน้อย 1 ปี ด้านบริหารจัดการระบบ ERP / SAP / Oracle Databaseมีทักษะภาษาอังกฤษในระดับพื้นฐานกระตือรือร้น และเรียนรู้ได้เร็วติดต่อสอบถามเพิ่มเติมได้ที่ 06-3198-1613 หรือ Line id : recruit-ksspIf you have the energy and qualifications to add to our velocity, please send your CV together with your present and expected salary by click "Apply Now" toHuman Resources Department804, 8thFloor, Chao Phya Tower, 89 Soi Wat Suan Plu, New Road, Bangrak, Bangkok 10500Tel : 06-3198-1613 or Line id : recruit-ksspAll personal data provided will be kept in strict confidence. Requests for access to or correction of personal data should be directed to the Director of Human Resources & Administration in writing at the above address. All personal data of unsuccessful candidates will be destroyed. All applicants may be considered for other suitable positions in the Kerry Group and its members.

What we expectA master of communication: verbally, power point, diagram. Use everything!Someone who loves challenges, who talks more about solutions than problems.A team player who can get the job done.Who knows how to code and query data, even though that might not be your favorite.Key responsibilities:Research pitching knowledge, design pitch together with designer and execute pitching presentationCollect requirements and write requirement specificationsManage every stakeholder to deliver requirement sign-off within the restricted time frame.Arrange and run requirement/survey meetingsHelp design, document and maintain system processesCommunicate with our developers and testers. job_responsibilities: ['Position Purpose:This position is responsible to proactively advise primarily the Thailand market and, secondarily, the South East Asia Markets of Vietnam, Laos & Nepal on all legal matters affecting its operation. The aim is to achieve corporate and commercial objectives in a manner that ensures compliance with the law and appropriate monitoring and management of legal risk. This position is reporting to SEA Legal Director.Main Areas of ResponsibilityAssist the SEA markets with developing an improved understanding of Tobacco and commercial regulations as well as improved capability to communicate/discuss/align on legal issues in a timely and appropriatemanner. Advise on commercial law, competitive law and other areas including employment, IT, advertising, labeling, consumer protection, and health and safety as necessary. Particular emphasis on all business contracts such a drafting, reviewing and negotiating general commercial contract (e.g. trading, purchasing, supply, distribution, agreements, etc.)Advise the business on product regulation, including reviewing developments and legislation on relevant legal and regulatory matters and informing the business.Providing advising and guidance on packaging marketing activities and legal issues as apart or the SEA management teamHandle regulatory complaints with the supervision of the Legal DirectorAssist employees with preparation of approval documents requiring legal review (GH&E, BAP’s, Other) Build and maintain strong working relationships within the SEA markets and understanding business needs and strategic plans to provide proactive and valued adviceCorporate secretarial duties and advice the business on Corporate Governance related issuesCollaborate with the Legal Director to develop training programs, precedents, guidance notes and updates for commercial management.Preferred ']
job_qualifications: ['s:Bachelor of Laws or higher from a well-recognized university in Thailand, with a preference for those possessing an LLM from a reputable university abroadStrong Thai and English proficiency skills, both verbal and written; strong legal and analytical skills; should have the ability to communicate legal issues/advice in aclear and concise manner. Computer literate and proficient with MS Word, Excel & PowerPoint applicationsWork Experience:Thailand Qualified lawyer with 7+ years post qualification experience (PQE)Previous experience from a reputable law firm and in-house experience requiredExperience in drafting, reviewing and negotiating general commercial contracts in EnglishEmployment, competition, and /or regulatory experience would be highly desirable ']
job_description: Position Purpose:This position is responsible to proactively advise primarily the Thailand market and, secondarily, the South East Asia Markets of Vietnam, Laos & Nepal on all legal matters affecting its operation. The aim is to achieve corporate and commercial objectives in a manner that ensures compliance with the law and appropriate monitoring and management of legal risk. This position is reporting to SEA Legal Director.Main Areas of ResponsibilityAssist the SEA markets with developing an improved understanding of Tobacco and commercial regulations as well as improved capability to communicate/discuss/align on legal issues in a timely and appropriatemanner. Advise on commercial law, competitive law and other areas including employment, IT, advertising, labeling, consumer protection, and health and safety as necessary. Particular emphasis on all business contracts such a drafting, reviewing and negotiating general commercial contract (e.g. trading, purchasing, supply, distribution, agreements, etc.)Advise the business on product regulation, including reviewing developments and legislation on relevant legal and regulatory matters and informing the business.Providing advising and guidance on packaging marketing activities and legal issues as apart or the SEA management teamHandle regulatory complaints with the supervision of the Legal DirectorAssist employees with preparation of approval documents requiring legal review (GH&E, BAP’s, Other) Build and maintain strong working relationships within the SEA markets and understanding business needs and strategic plans to provide proactive and valued adviceCorporate secretarial duties and advice the business on Corporate Governance related issuesCollaborate with the Legal Director to develop training programs, precedents, guidance notes and updates for commercial management.Preferred Qualifications:Bachelor of Laws or higher from a well-recognized university in Thailand, with a preference for those possessing an LLM from a reputable university abroadStrong Thai and English proficiency skills, both verbal and written; strong legal and analytical skills; should have the ability to communicate legal issues/advice in aclear and concise manner. Computer literate and proficient with MS Word, Excel & PowerPoint applicationsWork Experience:Thailand Qualified lawyer with 7+ years post qualification experience (PQE)Previous experience from a reputable law firm and in-house experience requiredExperience in drafting, reviewing and negotiating general commercial contracts in EnglishEmployment, competition, and /or regulatory experience would be highly desirable

job_responsibilities: ["RABBIT-LINE PAY COMPANY LIMITED is a joint venture between LINE-the number one Chat Application in Thailand, Rabbit-the first e-money service in Thailand with a common ticketing platform in BTS and AIS-the number one mobile operator in Thailand. \u200bWe are the first to connect both online and offline platforms together. As we're expanding our service lines, we're building up our organization to be an energetic working environment.General Description:The Compliance Manager provides supportsin compliance aspect and make sure that all company services and products complied with the Bank of Thailand and the Anti-Money Laundering Office regulations. This position holder has to collaborate all audit activities as well as ensure all IT processes and technology initiatives followed the PDPA (Personal Data Protection Act).Responsibilities:To support in compliance aspect and follow-up relevant legislation, regulations and implement applicable requirements from the Bank of Thailand and the Anti-Money Laundering OfficeTo correspond with relevant regulatory agencies and recommend corrective action and suggest improvementTo establish and update company regulations in accordance with local law and regulationsTo monitor business and operation procedures are complied with local law, regulation and company guidelineTo investigate & report financial incidents including fraud, money launderingTo raise potential & existing compliance issues to management in a timely and accurate mannerTo drive compliance culture by developing methods & contents for company-widecompliance communication and training programs.To assist with the development, implementation, and maintenance of an anti-money laundering program.To Develop and maintain a risk assessment framework for products and services, clients and customers, and other issues relating to money laundering.To Keep and maintain records of high risk customers, and reporting suspicious activities to the authorities.To Arrange and implement inspections and audits from third-party organizations, and making compliance recommendations based on their findings.To identify and plan for development of further business opportunities and deliver value added measurementTo plan and execute audit engagements, including identify and analyze IT system, IT operation processes, key risks and controls; determine audit scope; evaluating control design adequacy; and testing control performance To coordinate with other members and executives in order to conduct the IT audit programTo monitor data privacy risks arising in the Company activitiesTo raise awareness on how data privacy law affect data processing requirements and conduct a training and assessmentsTo carry out other duties and special assignments as assigned by the Management Team"]
job_qualifications: ['s:5+ years experienced in legal and complianceExperienced with AML and PDPA is a plusThai nationality and fluent in EnglishExperienced with Fintech or payment business preferred ']
job_description: RABBIT-LINE PAY COMPANY LIMITED is a joint venture between LINE-the number one Chat Application in Thailand, Rabbit-the first e-money service in Thailand with a common ticketing platform in BTS and AIS-the number one mobile operator in Thailand. ​We are the first to connect both online and offline platforms together. As we're expanding our service lines, we're building up our organization to be an energetic working environment.General Description:The Compliance Manager provides supportsin compliance aspect and make sure that all company services and products complied with the Bank of Thailand and the Anti-Money Laundering Office regulations. This position holder has to collaborate all audit activities as well as ensure all IT processes and technology initiatives followed the PDPA (Personal Data Protection Act).Responsibilities:To support in compliance aspect and follow-up relevant legislation, regulations and implement applicable requirements from the Bank of Thailand and the Anti-Money Laundering OfficeTo correspond with relevant regulatory agencies and recommend corrective action and suggest improvementTo establish and update company regulations in accordance with local law and regulationsTo monitor business and operation procedures are complied with local law, regulation and company guidelineTo investigate & report financial incidents including fraud, money launderingTo raise potential & existing compliance issues to management in a timely and accurate mannerTo drive compliance culture by developing methods & contents for company-widecompliance communication and training programs.To assist with the development, implementation, and maintenance of an anti-money laundering program.To Develop and maintain a risk assessment framework for products and services, clients and customers, and other issues relating to money laundering.To Keep and maintain records of high risk customers, and reporting suspicious activities to the authorities.To Arrange and implement inspections and audits from third-party organizations, and making compliance recommendations based on their findings.To identify and plan for development of further business opportunities and deliver value added measurementTo plan and execute audit engagements, including identify and analyze IT system, IT operation processes, key risks and controls; determine audit scope; evaluating control design adequacy; and testing control performance To coordinate with other members and executives in order to conduct the IT audit programTo monitor data privacy risks arising in the Company activitiesTo raise awareness on how data privacy law affect data processing requirements and conduct a training and assessmentsTo carry out other duties and special assignments as assigned by the Management TeamQualifications:5+ years experienced in legal and complianceExperienced with AML and PDPA is a plusThai nationality and fluent in EnglishExperienced with Fintech or payment business preferred

job_qualifications: ["s:Thai nationality Bachelor's or Master’s degree in Law 2 - 8 years’ work experience in Payment institution / Banking / Loan / Credit card.Minimum 2 years of progressively professional work experience in law firm/legal in-house/policy analysis, preferably in banking or any financial and technology industry. A mixed experience between corporate legal and lawfirm will be a plus; Excellent understanding in prevailing laws and regulation to non-Bank financial institution, Business Law, Corporate Law, Fintech Law and Investment Law;Excellent knowledge in Foreign Company related activities and BOI/MOC;Proven track record to conduct legal contractual and administrative issues, draft and review contracts, licenses related to companies activity;Proven track record of strong negotiation, communication, organizational and people management skills, and the ability to influence and build relationship without direct authority;Strong skills of: Analytics, Legal-Writing (e.g research brief, legal opinion, etc)Experienced in handling high volume of work and activities involving multiple and complex project simultaneously, highly self-motivated, detail-oriented and organized thinker with an ability to judge multiple priorities;Have experience with Fintech company is preferred.Excellence English command and Chinese is optionalJob detail:Reporting to the head of legal department, the incumbent will be responsible for providing day-to-day legal support to the Company’s business in Thailand, including matters related to:Prepare, draft, and review legal documents in both English and Thai, implement and improve existing templatesInterpret laws, rulings and regulations for business, conduct legal researchEnsure the appropriate protection of the Company’s intellectual property and compliance with laws, regulations and policies in ThailandLiaise with regulators, business units, other legal team members and lawyersPerform ad hoc duties assigned regarding corporate, regulatory, and compliance. "]
job_description: Qualifications:Thai nationality Bachelor's or Master’s degree in Law 2 - 8 years’ work experience in Payment institution / Banking / Loan / Credit card.Minimum 2 years of progressively professional work experience in law firm/legal in-house/policy analysis, preferably in banking or any financial and technology industry. A mixed experience between corporate legal and lawfirm will be a plus; Excellent understanding in prevailing laws and regulation to non-Bank financial institution, Business Law, Corporate Law, Fintech Law and Investment Law;Excellent knowledge in Foreign Company related activities and BOI/MOC;Proven track record to conduct legal contractual and administrative issues, draft and review contracts, licenses related to companies activity;Proven track record of strong negotiation, communication, organizational and people management skills, and the ability to influence and build relationship without direct authority;Strong skills of: Analytics, Legal-Writing (e.g research brief, legal opinion, etc)Experienced in handling high volume of work and activities involving multiple and complex project simultaneously, highly self-motivated, detail-oriented and organized thinker with an ability to judge multiple priorities;Have experience with Fintech company is preferred.Excellence English command and Chinese is optionalJob detail:Reporting to the head of legal department, the incumbent will be responsible for providing day-to-day legal support to the Company’s business in Thailand, including matters related to:Prepare, draft, and review legal documents in both English and Thai, implement and improve existing templatesInterpret laws, rulings and regulations for business, conduct legal researchEnsure the appropriate protection of the Company’s intellectual property and compliance with laws, regulations and policies in ThailandLiaise with regulators, business units, other legal team members and lawyersPerform ad hoc duties assigned regarding corporate, regulatory, and compliance.

Responsibilities:Gathering business requirements and understanding the company’s business processes and applications, including their effect on data and reporting.Designing, developing and maintaining warehouse data mainly via SSIS with multiple data sources and multiple ETL branches.Providing support and maintenance on ETL processes and documentation to ensure the best possible performance and quality in ETL.Designing, building and deploying BI solutions mainly via SSRS, Power BI and others BI tools.Developing complex SQL queries, stored procedures, basic financial analysis, and Excel models.Coordinating with the company’s paid Social Marketing team to track, monitor, and identify optimization opportunities in campaign performance.Monitoring and understanding changes in campaign and funnel metrics to identify areas of development.Assisting the Operations team to prepare and provide weekly and monthly dashboards/reports, and marketing KPI tracking at a brand and product level.Capturing consumer behavior trends to identify emerging customer needs and deliver sales insights development.Requirements:5+ years of experience in warehouse data or data & BI solutions, or, digital marketing data analytics.Experience in the insurance industry and familiar with Insurance Domain.Knowledge of SQL queries, SSIS, SSRS, Power BI (experience with other ETLs and BI Tools are also encouraged to apply).Experience working in web and digital marketing analytics. Preferably hands-on experience with the Google Analytics, Ads and Optimize; and Facebook’s analytics tools.Understanding of marketing metrics, media attribution models and campaign tracking.Familiar with programing language C# .Net, PHP, AngularJS.Strong analytical skills with the ability to collect, organize, analyze, and disseminate significant amounts of information with attention to detail and accuracy.Proficient in English (speaking, reading, writing) and good presentation skills.Experience in managing a small team.

Responsibilities:Build rapport and strengthen relationship with regulators (BOT, AMLO, OCPB, OIC and etc.).Coordinate with regulators, ICBC bank and related parties on regulatory requests.Provide consultation to the company on regulators’ regulations such as The Bank of Thailand, AMLO, OCPB, OIC and etc.Update/ present new principles and regulation changes to concerned departments.Provide advice and conduct training to employees on compliance knowledge .Be a focal point of managing and developing the company’s work process.Prepare the appropriate manuals/ materials based on fundamental academic and business operation.Develop customer service system through customer’s complaints.Specify complaint handling methods and coordinate with all concerned departments.Troubleshoot, supervise and coach the compliance team.Participate in any change management related to compliance matter.Perform other related tasks as requested.Key Requirements:Master degree in Business Administration, Accounting, Finance, Law ,Economics or related fieldsA minimum 10 years of compliance experience in financial institutions.Experiencing in supervising and coaching compliance team is at least 3-5 years.Good knowledge of regulators such as Bank of Thailand, AMLO, OCPB, OIC and etc.Observant, eager to learn and self-improvement.Strong problem solving, coordination, communication and people management skills.Good computer literacy.Proficiency in English both verbal and written communication.

Overview:Thai Union is the world’s leading seafood processor. The company with headquarters in Bangkok was founded in 1977, and since 1994 is listed on the Stock Exchange of Thailand (SET). Our core businesses focus largely on Ambient Fish & Seafood business (45%) and Frozen & Chilled seafood (42%), followed by Pet Care and other Value-Added products (13%). Thai Union had revenues of USD 4.1 Billion in 2017.Next to the Group’s private label and OEM business, Thai Union owns several leading shelf-stable seafood product brands, including Chicken of the Sea in the U.S., John West, Petit Navire, King Oscar and Mareblu in Europe, and Sealect and Fisho in Asia. Our global manufacturing footprints cover key strategic locations, including the U.S., Europe, Africa and Asia.We are seeking candidates with drive and passion to join the Group Strategy team at Thai Union. In this role, the Group Strategy Deputy Department Manager (DDM) will work in the Global Strategy team to develop Thai Union’s strategy and monitor its execution. He/she will build and continuously evolve financial models, analyze business performance, and make relevant recommendations to senior management. The DDM will be based in Bangkok and he/she will work closely with members of other Group functions and Operating Companies (OpCos).The successful candidate will be passionate about his/her work, detail-oriented and analytical. He/she will have excellent financial modelling skills, strong project management skills and ability to work on multiple projects simultaneously, effective communication skills (written and verbal), and must be comfortable in working in an ambiguous, dynamic environment and under tight timelines.Key responsibilities:Work on selected high-priority strategic projects, including growth strategies, M&A, business performance improvement, etc.Drive the annual Strategic Planning process; directly work with the OpCos to define their strategic priorities and implementation roadmapsSupport the Monthly and Quarterly Business Reviews; liaise with the OpCos and Group Finance to compile the required data and derive actionable recommendationsIndependently conduct selected industry and company analyses; gain insights on markets, competitors, relevant consumer trends, etc.Requirements:2-4 years of experience, with at least two years in strategy consulting (top-tier strategy firm preferred)Bachelor degree in related fields requiredExperience in (fast-moving) consumer goods industriesStrong business acumen, problem solving and advanced financial modelling skillsFluency in written and spoken English required (Thai language skills preferred)Proficient in Microsoft Office Programs (specifically strong in Microsoft Excel and Powerpoint)

Job Purpose/OverviewThe SEA Digital Commerce Performance Specialist is instrumental in instilling performance obsessed culture to maximize returns on customer investments. Key ResponsibilitiesBusiness data and performance analytics- Accountable for the adaptation and implementation of Perfect Digital Activation framework/template in SEA for annual and monthly planning, in accordance to global principals.- Introduce and evolve iROI calculation methodology and technology- Responsible for data integrity and quality of analysis of each growth lever.- Provide investment recommendations based on iROI to budget owners.Responsible for SEA test and learn to strengthen PDA key beliefs.Be the internal expert on platform (e-retailer) paid search- Responsible for investment, strategy, execution and evaluation of platform Search- Accountable for the continuous improvement in search iROIEducate budget owners on search best practices and make recommendations for sales team to execute for continuous top ranking improvementWork closely with Global Dcomm Community to learn and share insights/experience, adapt and execute on shared learnings in SEA.Context and ScopeThe role is responsible for all SEA markets – current active markets are Vietnam, Thailand, Malaysia, Singapore, Philippines and Indonesia.To cultivate a performance obsessed culture amongst its stakeholders, the SEA Digital Commerce Performance Specialist needs to relentlessly uphold data integrity, conduct and share analysis and recommendations.Being an individual contributor, the SEA Digital Commerce Performance Specialist works closely with internal (market dCommerce Customer Development Managers, Digital Merchandising Manager, Digital Marketing, Global Dcomm team, etc) and external stakeholders (retailers, e-distributor, solutions partners, etc.)

job_title: Risk Management Officer /เจ้าหน้าที่บริหารความเสี่ยง (รับหลายอัตรา)
job_description: หน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบโดยภาพรวม (Position Summary)ตรวจสอบข้อมูลและเปิด Port ให้แก่ลูกค้าที่สมัครเข้ามาเป็นสมาชิกซื้อขายทองคำแท่งกับบริษัทจัดทำรายงานเปิด Port ,รายงานปิด Port ,รายงานขยายวงเงินของลูกค้าจัดทำรายงาน Over due และติดตามการจ่ายชำระหนี้ของลูกค้า พร้อมทั้งประสานงานฝ่ายที่เกี่ยวข้องจัดทำรายงาน Call Margin และเรียกเงินประกันให้เพียงพอกับส่วนที่ขาดทุน ของลูกค้าแต่ละรายติดต่อธนาคารเพื่อสมัครใช้บริการ Direct Debit , Direct Creditตรวจสอบรายการ แก้ไข-ยกเลิก ออเดอร์ ของลูกค้าUp date รายชื่อบุคคลที่ถูกกำหนดตามมาตรา 6 ตามประกาศสำนักงาน ปปง. และรายงานธุรกรรมเงินสด ธุรกรรมทีน่าสงสัย ตาม ปปง กำหนด.ตรวจสอบชุดบัญชี (ถอนเงิน - ถอนทอง)จัดเก็บเอกสารลูกค้าเข้าตู้ พร้อมทั้ง SCAN เอกสาร และ Update ข้อมูลให้เป็นปัจจุบันงานอื่นๆที่ได้รับมอบหมายของผู้บังคับบัญชา

job_title: Building Manager,Assistant Building Manager/ผู้จัดการอาคาร,ผู้ช่วยผู้จัดการอาคาร
job_description: ทำงาน: 6วัน/สัปดาห์ 08.00-17.00 น.สถานที่ปฏิบัติงาน: สาธุประดิษฐ์ 19,โอเชี่ยนทาวเวอร์1,สุขุมวิท64เงินเดือน: ตามโครงสร้างบริษัทคุณสมบัติเพศชาย-หญิง อายุ25-45ปีปวส ป.ตรี ทุกสาขาถ้ามีประสบการณ์ด้านงานนิติฯจะรับพิจาณาเป็นพิเศษมีทักษะในงานด้านบริหารอาคารหน้าที่รับผิดชอบออกใบแจ้งหนี้และจัดเก็บค่าน้ำ+ค่าไฟ+ค่าที่จอดรถออกใบเสร็จรับเงินค่าใช้จ่ายต่างๆประสานงานกับผู้รับเหมา และฝ่ายงานต่างๆของบริษัทดูแลความเรียบร้อยของอาคาร งานด้านเอกสารและการแจ้งข่าวสารต่างๆ เจ้าของรับทราบดูแลควบคุมรปภ. แม่บ้าน อาคาร ช่างประจำอาคารงานต่างๆที่ได้รับมอบหมายสวัสดิการประกันสังคมกองทุนสำรองเลี้ยงชีพ (หลังผ่านทดลองงาน-ตามสมัครใจ)เครื่องแบบพนักงานค่ารักษาพยาบาล (ผู้ป่วยใน-ผู้ป่วยนอก)สิทธิการเบิกค่าทันตกรรมค่าใช้จ่ายในการเดินทางวันลาพักผ่อนประจำปี (หลังผ่านทดลองงาน-ตามอายุงานและระดับพนักงาน 7-15 วัน)วันลาอุปสมบท 15 วัน (อายุงานครบ 1 ปี)เงินโบนัส, ปรับเงินประจำปี (ขึ้นอยู่กับผลประกอบการ-ตามผลงาน)เบี้ยเลี้ยงในการปฏิบัติงานภายนอกตรวจสุขภาพประจำปี (อายุงานครบ 1 ปี)ค่าโทรศัพท์ (ขึ้นอยู่กับตำแหน่งงาน)เงินช่วยเหลือมงคลสมรสเงินช่วยเหลือมรณกรรม, งานฌาปนกิจศพ (พนักงานและบุคคลในครอบครัว)

job_title: เจ้าหน้าที่วิเคราะห์นโยบายแผนปลูกและแปรรูปกาแฟ โครงการพัฒนาดอยตุง จังหวัดเชียงราย
job_description: หน้าที่ความรับผิดรวบรวม จัดเก็บข้อมูลแปลงกาแฟ การใช้ประโยชน์ของพื้นที่ จัดทำฐานข้อมูลเกษตรกรผู้ปลูกกาแฟให้เป็นระบบระเบียบ มีความถูกต้องและตรงตามความเป็นจริงติดตามแผนการดำเนินงาน ให้เป็นไปตามนโยบายที่ได้มา ประกอบด้วยแผนงาน/กิจกรรมและแผนการใช้งบประมาณ และมาตราฐานตัวชี้วัดที่ครอบคลุม โดยมีเป้าหมายชัดเจนเข้าใจปัญหาการดำเนินงานและปัญหาของเกษตรกรอย่างถ่องแท้ผ่านการพูดคุยจัดทำรายงานวิเคราะห์และนำเสนอสถานการณ์ให้แก่ผู้บังคับบัญชาอย่าสม่ำเสมอส่งเสริมให้เกิดความร่วมมือและความสัมพันธ์ที่ดีระหว่างหน่วยงานและเกษตรกรผู้ปลูกกาแฟประสานงานกับหน่วยงานต่างๆงานอื่นๆที่ได้รับหมอบหมายคุณสมบัติเพิ่มเติมมีความชำนาญด้านคอมพิวเตอร์สามารถสื่อสารภาษาอังกฤษได้สามารถทำสถิติและวิเคราะห์ข้อมูลได้สามารถจัดทำแผนงานตามความเหมาะสมและสอดคล้องกับนโยบายติดตามและประสานงานกับทีมส่งเสริมในการปฏิบัติงานตามแผนงานช่องทางการติดต่อสมัครงานเบอร์โทร 053-767015 ต่อ 2301 0863784935To apply, please send your CV and cover letter to: Apply Now Please specify in the subject as “Application for (position)”.
